title: feat(tables): add select all interface to tables

body: > [!IMPORTANT] > Introduces batch actions for tables, enabling select all functionality and actions like delete or add to annotation queue, with supporting UI components, server logic, and tests. > > - **Batch Actions**: > - Introduces `BatchActionType` enum with `Create` and `Delete` actions in `types.ts`. > - Adds `BatchActionQuerySchema` and `CreateBatchActionSchema` for batch action queries. > - Implements `BatchActionQueue` in `batchActionQueue.ts` for handling batch action jobs. > - Adds `BatchActionProcessingEventSchema` and `BatchActionQueue` to `queues.ts`. > - Implements `handleBatchActionJob` in `handleBatchActionJob.ts` to process batch actions. > - **UI Components**: > - Adds `DataTableSelectAllBanner` in `data-table-select-all-banner.tsx` for select all interface. > - Implements `TableActionMenu` and `TableActionDialog` for batch action UI in `TableActionMenu.tsx` and `TableActionDialog.tsx`. > - Updates `DataTableToolbar` to include multi-select functionality. > - **API and Server**: > - Adds `createBatchActionJob` in `createBatchActionJob.ts` to create batch action jobs. > - Updates `traceRouter` in `traces.ts` to handle batch delete actions. > - Adds `tableRouter` in `tableRouter.ts` for batch action progress queries. > - **Testing**: > - Adds tests for batch actions in `batchAction.test.ts` to verify chunk processing and filtered queries. > - **Miscellaneous**: > - Updates `useSessionStorage` to sync state across tabs. > - Adds `useSelectAll` hook for managing select all state in tables. > > This description was created by [](https://www.ellipsis.dev?ref=langfuse%2Flangfuse&utm_source=github&utm_medium=referral) for 87977bc34bbb0c966af3dcaecf05e21441b3eb2c. It will automatically update as commits are pushed.
Will add standard DD observability settings via terraform once merged.
